nodes.text: The Tel Minor system, also known commonly as the Tel system and "The Green System", was a star system located within the Brak sector of the Expansion Region. The system was a planetary nebula that contained four planets and the white dwarf Tel.
Tel III, the third planet in the system, contained the top secret Rebel Alliance sector headquarters Oracle Base.
Jason Fry confirmed that the Tel Minor system was invented to account for discrepancies between the different sources, in this case the planet Tel IV.
